	As a Guest Experience Liaison Specialist, you&rsquo;ll blend safety oversight with hands-on instruction&mdash; onboarding guests onto the Trackman platform, teaching swing basics, and guiding them through games modes to maximize fun and comfort.

	Conduct a mandatory safety briefing before each session: outline bay rules, club-handling&nbsp;guidelines, and emergency procedures.

	Offer personalized swing tips&mdash;demonstrate grips, stances, and basic swing mechanics for first-time golfers.
	Assist guests with technology glitches or questions; escalate hardware/software issues to the Golf X Business Manager.
	Monitor bay activity continuously to enforce safety protocols and intervene if unsafe play is observed.

	2+ years of prior experience in sports coaching, recreation centers, or interactive-tech venues.
	Comfortable leading small groups and tailoring instruction to diverse skill levels.
	Strong safety awareness and risk mitigation
	Tech-savvy aptitude with gaming/tracking platforms
	Patient, enthusiastic customer engagement.

Guest Experience Liaison Specialist Job at Alan & Grant




        
    

        
        Alan & Grant - Our client, a leading infrastructure development company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Guest Experience Liaison Specialist

Job Location: Lagos
Job type: Full-time

Job Summary


	
	As a Guest Experience Liaison Specialist, you’ll blend safety oversight with hands-on instruction— onboarding guests onto the Trackman platform, teaching swing basics, and guiding them through games modes to maximize fun and comfort.
	


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Conduct a mandatory safety briefing before each session: outline bay rules, club-handling guidelines, and emergency procedures.
	Provide a concise, engaging tutorial on the Trackman interface: registration, game selection, club tracking features, and scoring.
	Offer personalized swing tips—demonstrate grips, stances, and basic swing mechanics for first-time golfers.
	Assist guests with technology glitches or questions; escalate hardware/software issues to the Golf X Business Manager.
	Monitor bay activity continuously to enforce safety protocols and intervene if unsafe play is observed.
	Gather guest feedback on their experience and share insights with the management team to refine training materials.


Requirements


	A strong passion for golf fundamentals.
	2+ years of prior experience in sports coaching, recreation centers, or interactive-tech venues.
	Comfortable leading small groups and tailoring instruction to diverse skill levels.
	Strong safety awareness and risk mitigation
	Tech-savvy aptitude with gaming/tracking platforms
	Patient, enthusiastic customer engagement.

Secretary Job at Pacific Schools




        
    

        
        Pacific school was established in October, 1994 as Pacific Comprehensive College, a co-educational Day and Boarding High School. Founded as an independent School, it initially catered for the needs of primary school leavers whose parents were desirous of hard core academics. The initial emphasis was on Science and Mathematics but later incorporated all arts and social science into its curriculum.

The College was approved by the Lagos State Government and accredited by the West African Examinations Council WAEC in 1998. It later gained accreditation of the National Examinations Council NECO in 2001. Our strength lies in our emphasis on mastery of academic subjects and we pride ourselves in getting our students prepared for college and for success in the wider world of work.
     

            
    



Our University /College Admission rate is about 85% while 15% of our students go for professional training and vocational careers. Some 10% of our College bound students get admitted into U.S universities. In October 2007 the Pre-school and Primary School was established in response to the demand of the High School parents and the requirement of the Nigerian 6-3-3-4 system of Education. The Sixth Form programme came on board in 2010.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Secretary

Job Location: Akure, Ondo
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
Administrative Support:


	Manage schedules and appointments for executives or managers
	Organize meetings and prepare agendas
	Take minutes during meetings
	Handle travel arrangements (flights, hotels, itineraries)


Communication Management:


	Answer phone calls and emails professionally
	Receive and direct visitors
	Serve as a point of contact between departments, staff, and external stakeholders
	Draft and send correspondence (letters, memos, reports)


Record Keeping:


	Maintain filing systems (both physical and electronic)
	Keep records of meetings, activities, and transactions
	Ensure confidentiality of sensitive information


Office Organization:


	Order and manage office supplies
	Ensure the office environment is tidy and efficient
	Coordinate repair and maintenance of office equipment


Document Preparation:


	Type and format documents, letters, reports, and presentations
	Edit and proofread materials before submission or distribution
	Prepare documents for meetings, presentations, or legal compliance


Time and Task Management:


	Prioritize tasks for efficiency
	Remind executives and staff of upcoming deadlines or obligations
	Assist in project coordination


Data Entry and Management:


	Input and update data in spreadsheets, databases, or systems
	Maintain accuracy and organization of records


Support in Decision-Making:


	Provide information and background materials to aid decisions
	Prepare summaries or briefs as requested.


Confidentiality and Professionalism:


	Handle sensitive information with discretion
	Maintain a professional demeanor at all times


Compliance and Protocol:


	Ensure policies and procedures are followed
	Stay updated on organizational rules and regulations.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree / HND or NCE qualification.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: pacificacademy2012@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Procurement Officer

Job Location:&nbsp;Trans - Amadi, Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time
Business: Oil &amp; Gas Servicing

Duties / Responsibilities
